remarks: Replacing the edges of a hypergraph results in a hypergraph. (Contributed by AV, 18-Jan-2020.)
statement:
uhgrepe.v $e |- V = ( Base ` G ) $.
uhgrepe.s $e |- S = ( .ef ` ndx ) $.
uhgrepe.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. UHGraph ) $.
uhgrepe.e $e |- ( ph -> E : dom E --> ( ~P V \ { (/) } ) ) $.
uhgrepe.u $e |- ( ph -> E e. _V ) $.
uhgrepe $p |- ( ph -> ( G sSet <. S , E >. ) e. UHGraph ) $.
